body: Well, author is writing part 3(checked his twitter) and I am going there just to say to him how stupid I feel after reading his lame ass "ntr", if in the end this ends as: The onee chan marries but stil gets banged by mc....I'll jump out of the highest floor of the Empire State, cuz damn it will be such a disapointment cuz hear me now: 1st thing is a ntr doujin, 2nd thing is a apparentaly vanilla doujin that turns out to be emotionaly grim, and the 2nd thing is the worst cuz makes you raise hopes about a happy ending, and no, it's not just about sex, not just about masturbating, it's about reading a story where you can see the deepest carnal bonding between 2 people who love each other(or at least should).

Just want to share this because I'm an optimist and there's no proper context or citation in the story.
So based on my optimist understanding the mc left his village for the city life for idk experience, success, reasons or whatever then the older sister like him but felt betrayed when he left so he got arranged marriage so that she can forget him but she might've never seen the guy she just feels sad, and betrayed by the mc's decision but she still love the mc, (Tsundere) typical! The little sister knowing this wanting her older sister to be happy she did what she had to and because she love the mc she first had sex with him to alleviate her feelings of longing for her so basically a good ending and for goodness sake the engagement might have been faked by her parents so that this outcome may happen and that the little sister was in it all along. A pretty good interpretation I must say am I right? Haha

holy hot
@minminazus Nice!, Thanks for summary, no NTR at all. So Aoi is like wingwomen to make Suiren becomes honest to be with Kei huh, but at least she joins his harem.

@imlnwgame : Suiren got a fiance, but she only do so because she thought her first love already abandoned her. She tried to insist that she's now someone's fiance, but inside she's still in love with Kei and is jealous seeing her sister having sex so happily like that. There are some lines which sounds like from those kind of story (p60 and p75). I'm not sure how the auditors holding clipboard with checklist of "does this deserve our sacred tag" would think, but the drama itself has a nice longing feel to it for me, and the classic dreamy summer vacation in rural town atmosphere. Want to see how, if they would try keep it a secret or actually face their families about their desire (and cancel the engagement), especially with how he and Aoi decided all three of them are in this together.

Based on January 31st update <https://fantia.jp/posts/1105224>, he planned for next work on March or April. Natsu no Yarinaoshi Midsummer edition (mother and daughter sex), and Natsu no Yarinaoshi side story August 32nd (hopefully not some endless eight joke). Still subject to change though. Volume 1 and 2 got 20% discount in Fanza, for those who wants to support :) <https://www.dmm.co.jp/dc/doujin/-/list/=/article=series/id=3007138/>
Can someone summarize story please? I thought elder sister has fiancé in first chapter, but there is no NTR tag on official JP site too. So this is not NTR and i would like to know the story now.

When he got his job, Kei had to hurriedly left the village, he didn't even have the chance to say good bye. Meanwhile, Suiren who is actually stubborn, didn't try to contact him or talk about it. She thought Kei had abandoned her, so the engagement is her way to get over her first love. This means, Suiren herself is actually still not over Kei yet. Aoi is the one who asks to invite Kei back for the engagement party and give her sister a wake up slap (p19). But before that, Kei asks Aoi if she's fine with sacrificing herself if he and Suiren became couple and leave her alone in this village (p36). After that, Kei, who doesn't like seeing Suiren being taken by another man, finally have sex until she admit her own feeling. By the way, her fiance is working abroad, and they're waiting until he came back before sex (p76), which probably the engagement party is also to welcome him. Kei quit his job, so he's probably going to stay in the village (p88). Their parents are on vacation (p28).
